scripts.install:all: cd apps/opsiron-web && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../craftops/editioncoffeeroastery && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../aycaninsaat && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../stokdemo && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../finansdemo && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix apps/craftops/aycaninsaat && npm run build --prefix apps/craftops/editioncoffeeroastery && npm run build --prefix apps/craftops/stokdemo && npm run build --prefix apps/craftops/finansdemo
